document_data.mainbody:
A Forest Monarch was a special kind of tree in the Feywild. More than mere trees, they were emblems of the Feywild, vessels of life force, and primeval spirits.
One of those trees had a trunk over  in diameter after petrifying itself, its bare branches had transformed into a vaulted cyst atop the tree.
One forest monarch captured the Traitor while the latter fled from Stardeep after the Spellplague, around the year . The tree petrified the Traitor, sacrificing itself as well in the process.
* Golden Tree of Dawn
